    • Method Detail

      • getSuccess

        public boolean getSuccess()

      • getException

        public java.lang.Exception getException()

      • login

        public void login()
        Called on log in. Checks if user is blocked and if user is admin

      • register

        public void register()
        Called when registering a new user

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Called on logout. Sets relevant booleans to false and username to an empty string

      • browse

        public void browse()
        Calls the browse method in the controller which returns a list with all items currently in the database

      • putInCart

        public void putInCart(Inventory item)
        Calls getRemaining to get the remaining amount in stock for the specific item to check that the amount to put in cart does not exceed. After that calls the method in the controller to put the specified item in the shopping cart and returns that list.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to put in the shopping cart

      • updateCart

        public void updateCart()
        Returns the total sum of all the items currently in the shopping cart

      • buy

        public void buy()
        Calls the buy method in the controller that returns the shopping cart equal to null. Sets the total sum to 0 in order to make it not render on the page (adminGUI.xhtml)

      • showUsers

        public void showUsers()
        Calls the method in the controller to get a list of all registered users

      • blockOrUnblock

        public void blockOrUnblock(Users user)
        Calls the method in the controller to block or unblock the specified user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be blocked or unblocked

      • refillStock

        public void refillStock(Inventory item)
        Calls the method in the controller to restock the specified item with the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to restock

      • addNewItem

        public void addNewItem()
        Called when adding a new item to the database.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Called when removing an item from the database
